title: North Carolina Bought Up More Tesla, GE, and Disney Stock
text:
North Carolina limits the number of dealerships Tesla is allowed to have within its boundaries, but the Tar Heel State recently increased its investment in the electric-vehicle maker.

In July, North Carolina Gov. Roy Cooper signed a law that applies to companies that manufacture and sell “only motor vehicles that are plug-in electric vehicles that do not rely on any nonelectric source of power in all modes of operation.” Tesla (ticker: TSLA) isn’t named, but that description doesn’t apply to any other company that’s opening...
description: North Carolina limits the number of dealerships Tesla is allowed to have in its boundaries, but the Tar Heel State recently increased its investment in the electric-vehicle maker.
